ldc_scope.charseq: Despite last week's efforts, Helgesen and Yasushi Akashi, an envoy from Japan, the island's biggest aid donor, could not convince the Tiger rebels to restart talks which they suspended in April over what, they said, is a lack of progress in rebuilding the war-hit Tamil areas

extent.charseq: February last year to end the 19 years of civil war

ldc_scope.charseq: The Sri Lankan government of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe signed a Norway-brokered ceasefire with the Tamil Tigers in February last year to end the 19 years of civil war, during which 65,000 people were reported to have been killed and 1. 6 million displaced
